name: Black Loli in a Box (Global Game Jam 2015)
body:
Black Loli in a Box
-------------------

Black Loli in a Box (BLB) is a top-down adventure game submitted for Global Game Jam 2015. See the game on Global Game Jam website [here](http://globalgamejam.org/2015/games/black-loli-box-kyaaa-what-should-we-do).

Plot
----

A loli is trapped in cardboard box world filled with zombies. And megazombies. Find and fight your way around, using helpful clues from unknown deity along the way.

Yes, it sounds insane, but we didn't have a stable mind when designing this game.

Controls
--------

- Directional arrow : Move around
- WASD keys         : Attack
- Alt-F4            : Exit from the game (sorry ._.)

Staff List
----------

 - Design and program: Ted Kesgar
 - Graphics: Gp Radheka
 - Music: Monkeyth
